title: [Large-scale] Flipped Learning Design Strategies for Improving Learning Outcomes in Vocational High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pedagogical concepts and general understanding of vocational training programs
context.additional_context: Aims to design a flipped learning model applicable in vocational education settings, emphasizing learning outcome assessment strategies through analysis of actual vocational high school cases.

learning_goals: Understand the core principles of flipped learning and apply them to vocational high school educational contexts.
Create activity sheets for designing flipped learning lessons across various vocational fields (mechanical, electrical, culinary, etc.).
Develop and implement quantitative and qualitative assessment tools for measuring learning outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
